metadata.title: CVE-2018-13796 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNU Mailman before 2.1.28. A crafted URL cancause arbitrary text to be displayed on a web page from a trusted site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13796` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mailman - 1:2.1.26-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mailman package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.1.26-1ubuntu0.1').
